item.title: 政治家们正在接近通过联邦立法所需的票数，该立法要求在每辆新车中安装调幅收音机。
item.description:
Politicians are closing in on the required number of votes needed to pass federal legislation that requires AM radios in every new car. https://t.co/x6OgBUrS8T

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 当局称，上周末在新泽西州伍德布里奇的一户居民家中发生了一起明显的狗袭击事件，造成一名婴儿死亡，孩子的父母受伤。
item.description:
An infant was killed and the child's parents injured in an apparent attack by a dog at a home in Woodbridge, New Jersey, over the weekend, authorities said.

The baby was pronounced dead at the scene. https://t.co/S6NRKvFbo4 pic.twitter.com/JtAbgI3h6V

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 今年早些时候，艾尔-金在为多莉-帕顿（Dolly Parton）78 岁生日致敬时，声称自己喝醉了，并对自己在 "乡村老大剧院"（Grand Ole Opry）的表演口出狂言。
item.description:
Elle King is speaking out about her expletive-filled performance at the Grand Ole Opry earlier this year, during which she claimed to be drunk during a tribute for Dolly Parton's 78th birthday. https://t.co/1gTJYqEuWA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 马克-鲁法洛（Mark Ruffalo）、拉米-优素福（Ramy Youssef）以及兄妹组合比莉-艾利什（Billie Eilish）和芬尼亚斯-奥康纳尔（Finneas O'Connell）在周日举行的 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼上佩戴红色胸针，以表示对以色列-哈马斯战争停火的支持。
item.description:
Mark Ruffalo, Ramy Youssef and brother-sister duo Billie Eilish and Finneas O’Connell wore red pins to show support for a cease-fire in the ongoing Israel-Hamas war at the 2024 Oscars on Sunday. https://t.co/tg1CGIT9TN pic.twitter.com/qxFEdLfWKA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在一场公众争议中，威尔士王妃凯特做了一件在她之前只有少数王室成员做过的事：她公开道歉了。
item.description:
In the middle of a public controversy, Kate, the Princess of Wales, did something that only a handful of royal family members have done before her: She apologized publicly. https://t.co/BICLDAy1qi

item.title: 伊娃-门德斯（Eva Mendes）支持她的 "男人 "瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）在周日奥斯卡颁奖典礼上的表现。"这位女演员和两个孩子的母亲在 Instagram 上发布的视频中写道："永远支持我的男人。
item.description:
Eva Mendes is supporting her “man” Ryan Gosling following his Oscars performance on Sunday.

“Always by my man,” the actress and mom of two wrote in an Instagram video post of herself standing next to Gosling’s Oscars dressing room sign. https://t.co/yHsw8wpCqh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周日，在达文-乔伊-伦道夫凭借在《宿醉》（The Holdovers）中饰演玛丽-兰姆（Mary Lamb）一角获得奥斯卡最佳女配角奖之前，她的前同学、2014 年在同一奖项中获奖的露皮塔-尼永奥（Lupita Nyong'o）介绍了她。
item.description:
Moments before Da'Vine Joy Randolph won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actress for her performance as Mary Lamb in "The Holdovers" on Sunday, her former schoolmate, Lupita Nyong'o, who won in the same category in 2014, introduced her. https://t.co/YYM6Wu7Yf6 pic.twitter.com/VdRmOxsOgZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：特朗普的律师要求负责监督其封口费案件的法官推迟审判，同时最高法院将权衡特朗普的论点，即他在任期间发生的行为可以免于起诉。
item.description:
BREAKING: Attorneys for Trump have asked the judge overseeing his hush money case to delay the trial while the Supreme Court weighs Trump's argument that he is immune from prosecution for conduct that occurred while he was in office.https://t.co/aPBRV58rdv pic.twitter.com/OrkqgaouxJ

item.title: "艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）在奥斯卡获奖感言中说："这个奖项中的女性--桑德拉、安妮特、凯瑞、莉莉--我与你们分享这个奖项。"我敬畏你们...我希望我们能继续合作下去"。
item.description:
"The women in this category — Sandra, Annette, Carey, Lily — I share this with you," said Emma Stone in her #Oscars acceptance speech. "I'm in awe of you... I hope we get to keep doing more together."https://t.co/VLk4fU8DBD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish 创造了历史，成为有史以来获得两项奥斯卡奖的最年轻的获奖者。这位 22 岁的歌手和她的哥哥芬尼亚斯-奥康纳尔（Finneas O'Connell）凭借《芭比娃娃》原声带中的 "What Was I Made For? "获得了奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖。
item.description:
Billie Eilish has made history, becoming the youngest person ever to win two Academy Awards.

The 22-year-old singer and her older brother, Finneas O'Connell, won the Oscar for Best Original Song for "What Was I Made For?" from the "Barbie" soundtrack. https://t.co/3zeTYQhgkp pic.twitter.com/ZAaXhY0lJG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "花月杀手》女星莉莉-格拉德斯通（Lily Gladstone）身着土著设计师定制的 Gucci 礼服出席了第 96 届奥斯卡颁奖典礼，进一步彰显了她的美国土著文化。
item.description:
"Killers of the Flower Moon" star Lily Gladstone arrived at the 96th Academy Awards donning a custom Gucci dress from an Indigenous designer to further highlight her Native American culture. https://t.co/hObbkwFfTD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 海地持续不断的武装叛乱背后最重要的领导人向该国领导人、代理总理阿里尔-亨利传达了一个简单的信息：下台，暴力就会结束，至少是暂时的。
item.description:
The most prominent leader behind the ongoing armed rebellion in Haiti has a simple message for the country's leader, acting Prime Minister Ariel Henry: Step down and the violence ends, at least temporarily. https://t.co/HvOnUmdcMc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024
